column1: Kurúki was an evil magician in a preliminary sketch of the tale of Turambar and the Foalókë. When Nienor and her mother Morwen (at that point named Vainóni and Tirannë) stumble upon him
column2: he gives them a drink which causes them to forget their names and wander distraught in the woods.

column1: Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
